title: Rainy night city driving with a bus and cars on the road.
caption: A white bus drives down a rainy city street at night.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 1 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is rainy (hardRainNight). The ego vehicle is almost stopped (average speed â‰ˆ 0.0 m/s). There are 30 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
description: The road is wet from the rain. The white bus is driving down the street with cars behind it. There is a red car parked on the side of the road. The traffic lights are green.
reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving slowly because of the rain and the presence of other vehicles on the road. It is maintaining a safe distance from the bus and other cars. The driver is paying attention to the traffic lights and adjusting their speed accordingly.
